long_description: The adaptable REI Triad parka offers 3 protection options: You can wear the shell with the liner, wear only the shell or wear only the liner. REI Elements(R)-rated nylon shell is breathable, waterproof and windproof to 60+ mph; lining fabrics wick moisture, add warmth and perfect the fit. Zip-off hood features a brim to shield your eyes and front and back volume adjustments to preserve vision; collar is lined with brushed tricot. Stormflap protects zipper and keeps wind from moving through. Drawcord hem and adjustable cuffs seal in warmth. Shell has 2 zip exterior hand pockets, 2 flap pockets with snap closures and 2 zip chest pockets; inner zip chest pocket has a cord port. Insulated liner jacket features collar and cuffs with stretch binding, a 1-hand-adjustable drawcord hem, zippered hand and chest pockets and an interior pocket with cord port. Polyfill synthetic insulation stays warm even when damp; Triad liner's back length is 30 in. Liner is wind resistant up to 45 mph. With the liner jacket zipped into the shell you get maximum protection and warmth; or wear either piece separately as weather conditions dictate. REI Triad parka has a classic fit.
short_description: The adaptable REI Triad parka offers 3 protection options: You can wear the shell with the liner, wear only the shell or wear only the liner.
